question: Who won the UEFA men's player of the year award?
explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo has won his third UEFA men's player of the year award in four seasons, beating Lionel Messi and Gianluigi Buffon to get the trophy. Ronaldo picked up the trophy for the second consecutive season and third time in total, having also received the accolade in 2013/14. The UEFA Men's Player of the Year award is based on players' performances during the 2016/17 season in all competitions, both domestic and international, and at club and national team levels.
